{"id":978607638,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"4 days, 3 hours","timestamp":1687620852,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1870 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/978607638/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Construct the Longest New String","memory":"55.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    // 0 =x\n    //1=y\n    // 2=z\n    Integer[][][][]  dp;\n    public int longestString(int x, int y, int z) {\n        dp=new Integer[x+1][y+1][z+1][4];\n        return rec(x,y,z,-1);      \n    }\n    public int rec(int x,int y,int z,int prev){\n        int ans=0;\n        if(dp[x][y][z][prev+1]!=null){\n            return dp[x][y][z][prev+1];\n        }\n       \n            if(x>0 && prev!=0){\n             ans=rec(x-1,y,z,0)+2;\n        }\n        \n        if(prev!=0 && z>0){\n            ans=Math.max(ans,rec(x,y,z-1,2)+2);\n        }\n        if(prev!=2 && y>0 && prev!=1){\n            ans=Math.max(ans,rec(x,y-1,z,1)+2);\n        }\n        return dp[x][y][z][prev+1]=ans;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"construct-the-longest-new-string","has_notes":false}
